#include<stdio.h>
#include<utility>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<sstream>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

typedef vector<int> vi; 
typedef vector<vi> vvi; 
typedef pair<int,int> ii; 
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define clr(x) x.clear()
#define sz(x) ((int)(x).size())
#define F first
#define S second
#define REP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,b) for(i=0;i<b;i++)
#define rep1(i,b) for(i=1;i<=b;i++)
#define mod 1000000007
#define pi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pin(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define piw(n) printf("%d ",n)
#define pll(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define plln(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define pllw(n) printf("%lld ",n)
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define ss(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define ps(s) printf("%s",s)
#define psn(s) printf("%s\n",s)
#define psw(s) printf("%s ",s)
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pn printf("\n")
#define pw printf(" ") 
#define pb push_back 
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
#define tr(c,i) for(typeof((c)).begin() i = (c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++) 
#define present(c,x) ((c).find(x) != (c).end()) 
#define cpresent(c,x) (find(all(c),x) != (c).end()) 

vector <int>primes; 
int main(int argc, char **argv)
{
	int n,a,b;
	//cin>>n;
	vi pr;
	vector<char> chprime;
	chprime.resize(10000101,0);
	vector<int> prime;
	prime.resize(10000100);
	prime[0]=prime[1]=0;
	
	/*int i;
	for(i=0;i<=10000000;i++)
	{
		if(isprime(i))
			prime[i]=prime[i-1]+1;
		else
			prime[i]=prime[i-1];
	}
	*/
	//int pow[prime[10000000]];
	//for(i=
	
	for(int i=2;i<=10000000;i++)
	{
		if(chprime[i]==0)
		{
			int s=i+i;
			while(s<=10000000)
			{
				chprime[s]=1;
				s=s+i;
			}
			prime[i]=prime[i-1]+1;
		}
		else
			prime[i]=prime[i-1];
	}
	
	int i;
	vi pow;
	pow.pb(1);
	for(i=1;i<prime[10000000];i++)
	{
		pow.pb((2*pow[i-1])%10007);
	}
	/*
	for(i=0;i<30;i++)
	{
		cout<<"num \n"<<i<<"\nno of primes  before it ";
		cout<<prime[i]<<endl;
	}
	*/
	//cout<<"\nhello1\n";
	while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
	{
		//cout<<"\nhello2\n";
		//cout<<n<<" "<<prime[n]<<endl;
		
		int x=2,y=prime[n]-1;
		if(y==-1)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		else if(y==0)
		{
			cout<<1<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		else
		{
			/*while(y>0)
			{
			x=x<<2;
			x=x%10007;	
			y--;
			//cout<<x<<endl;
			}*/
			cout<<pow[y]<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
